body_html:
@jhetherly : Made PR #16520 - could you look at it? I extracted most index computation logic to separate class, this made implementing intra-op parallelism much easier.

I tested it locally by command
bazel test --config=opt --test_output=all '//tensorflow/contrib/periodic_resample/...'
all tests passed successfully.

body:
@jhetherly : Made PR https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16520 - could you look at it? I extracted most index computation logic to separate class, this made implementing intra-op parallelism much easier.

I tested it locally by command
bazel test --config=opt --test_output=all '//tensorflow/contrib/periodic_resample/...'
all tests passed successfully.
